column5: Correct the integer overflow check in store_timespec(). Fixes oss-fuzz issue #31463
column6: commit d1cc1c59e8d1ac0dee8e99c5f2f1d7b254bf05a7Author: Todd C. Miller <Todd.Miller@sudo.ws>Date:   Fri Feb 26 16:43:48 2021 -0700    Correct the integer overflow check in store_timespec().    Fixes oss-fuzz 31463

column5: Return NOT_FOUND from the set_cmnd_path() stub since we don\'t set user_cmnd. The purpose of set_cmnd_path() is to reset user_cmnd based on a new runchroot.  For the stub version we don\'t modify user_cmnd and so must not return a status of FOUND. Fixes oss-fuzz issue #31250 which only affected the fuzzer and not sudo.
column6: commit 322e0b3693fa43d281ffe082a1e08e523e8dd17fAuthor: Todd C. Miller <Todd.Miller@sudo.ws>Date:   Mon Feb 22 19:53:08 2021 -0700    Return NOT_FOUND from the set_cmnd_path() stub since we don't set user_cmnd.    The purpose of set_cmnd_path() is to reset user_cmnd based on a new    runchroot.  For the stub version we don't modify user_cmnd and so    must not return a status of FOUND.    Fixes oss-fuzz 31250 which only affected the fuzzer and not sudo.

column5: Fix NUL termination when parsing a sudoers file with no ending newline. oss-fuzz issue #30252
column6: commit 884b2fb86b3089f900cfd6d0379bf8629d2fc5beAuthor: Todd C. Miller <Todd.Miller@sudo.ws>Date:   Wed Feb 3 13:49:21 2021 -0700    Fix NUL termination when parsing a sudoers file with no ending newline.    oss-fuzz 30252

column5: Parser needs user_shost for the %h escape in @include expansion. Fixes oss-fuzz issue #30238
column6: commit e66b132d7674778105b6c98153470631aaad773cAuthor: Todd C. Miller <Todd.Miller@sudo.ws>Date:   Wed Feb 3 08:56:32 2021 -0700    Parser needs user_shost for the %h escape in @include expansion.    Fixes oss-fuzz 30238

column5: Remove options from the leak list before freeing them. Should fix oss-fuzz issue #30236
column6: commit bd4e8bc699ba1355c5579f345b4521017b8454f1Author: Todd C. Miller <Todd.Miller@sudo.ws>Date:   Wed Feb 3 07:52:38 2021 -0700    Remove options from the leak list before freeing them.    Should fix oss-fuzz 30236
